T02D2085:161a-1: tree k'a ya w'ak tsitt'a dhishtha no der sha n'a ma /
T02D2085:161a-3: lus ngag yid gsum byin gyis brlab ba'i man ngag ces bya ba /
T02D2085:161a-4: bcom ldan 'das gshin rje'i gshed la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2085:161a-5: slob dpon dam tshig sdom ldan pas //
T02D2085:161a-6: legs bshams mdun du mandala la ;
T02D2085:161a-7: / lhag pa'i lha bsam phyi nang gi / mchod bstod gsol gdab byas rjes su //
T02D2085:161a-8: bdag mdun tha dad med par bya //
T02D2085:161a-9: spyi bo mgrin pa snying ga dang //
T02D2085:161a-10: nu ma'i bar du yi ge bzhi //
T02D2085:161a-12: dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02D2085:161b-0: sku gsung thugs dang ye shes @161b bsdu //
T02D2085:161b-1: yon phul gsol gdab byas pa yis //
T02D2085:161b-2: slob ma rjes su gzung bar bya //
T02D2085:161b-3: yi ge bzhi las bdud rtsi'i rgyun //
T02D2085:161b-4: slob ma'i gnas bzhir rim gyis dbab //
T02D2085:161b-5: de yi mthu dang nus pa yis //
T02D2085:161b-6: snang gsal bde dang ro gcig pa //
T02D2085:161b-7: rim bzhin nyams su myong ba yis //
T02D2085:161b-8: lus ngag yid gsum bag chags bcas //
T02D2085:161b-9: ma lus spangs nas rdo rje bzhi'i //
T02D2085:161b-10: dngos grub g-yo med thob pa na //
T02D2085:161b-11: bde chen 'di ni bde ba che //
T02D2085:161b-12: 'di las gzhan pa'i bde ba gang //
T02D2085:161b-13: gzhan du yod pa ma yin zhes //
T02D2085:161b-14: rdo rje'i dgra yis rnam par bsgrag / de rjes phyag rgyas mandala dbul //
T02D2085:161b-15: phra mo'i rnal 'byor rnam bzhi yis //
T02D2085:161b-17: nam mkha' lta bur mtha' dbus spang //
T02D2085:161b-19: thams cad phyag rgya chen por shog / slob ma
T02D2085:161b-20: rjes su gzung ba lus ngag yid gsum byin gyis
T02D2085:161b-21: brlab pa'i man ngag slob dpon sangs rgyas ye shes
T02D2085:161b-22: zhabs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02D2085:161b-24: // / yul dbus kyi pandi ta a'a nanda bha dra dang /
T02D2085:161b-25: bod kyi lo ts'a ba se tsha bsod nams rgyal
T02D2085:161b-26: mtshan gyis grong khyer chen po ti ra ha te'i
T02D2085:161b-27: lho phyogs rang byung gi mchod rten rnam par dag
T02D2085:161b-28: pa'i drung du yul dbus kyi dpe dang mthun par
T02D2085:161b-29: bsgyur cing bcos te gtan la phab pa'o /
T02D2085:161b-32: // / slar yang grub thob karna shr'i'i zhal sda nas mnyan
T02D2085:161b-33: te thar pa lo ts'a ba gnas brtan nyi ma
T02D2085:161b-34: rgyal mtshan gyis shr'i na lendra'i gtsug lag khang chen
